instruction: Hi, I'm Jaden Roy (cust_id: 100448). I'm looking to buy some golf equipment and want to see what products are available with their costs. Also, check if there are any active promotions on golf equipment. Finally, I'd like to update my marketing preferences to opt out of all promotional emails and affinity card offers since I mentioned this before in my comments.

actions.sql: SELECT p.prod_id, p.prod_name, p.prod_desc, p.prod_list_price, c.unit_cost FROM products p JOIN costs c ON p.prod_id = c.prod_id WHERE p.prod_category LIKE '%Golf%' AND p.prod_status = 'Available'
SELECT promo_name, promo_desc, promo_cost FROM promotions WHERE promo_category LIKE '%Golf%' AND CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN promo_begin_date AND promo_end_date
UPDATE supplementary_demographics SET affinity_card = 0, misc = 0 WHERE cust_id = 100448

instruction: You are Regina Ogletree (cust_id: 10954) and you want to return the defective 'Slugger Youth Series Maple Bat' (prod_id: 128) purchased on 2021-09-22 through Direct Sales channel (channel_id: 3). Process a full refund of $26.46 and update the sales record accordingly.

actions.sql: UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold - 1, amount_sold = amount_sold - 26.46 WHERE prod_id = 128 AND cust_id = 10954 AND time_id = '2021-09-22' AND channel_id = 3;
INSERT INTO returns (prod_id, cust_id, time_id, channel_id, return_amount, return_date) VALUES (128, 10954, '2021-09-22', 3, 26.46, CURRENT_DATE);

instruction: I'm Noah Prabu (cust_id 100247) and want to buy a new golf club set. First, I need to check the details of product ID 117 (including description, price, and weight) to ensure it's suitable. Then I want to see if there are any active promotions for golf equipment that could apply. Finally, I want to record my purchase of 1 unit of this product today (2023-11-15) through channel 3 (online store) without any promotion.

actions.sql: SELECT prod_name, prod_desc, prod_list_price, prod_weight_class FROM products WHERE prod_id = 117;
SELECT promo_name, promo_cost FROM promotions WHERE promo_category = 'Golf' AND '2023-11-15' BETWEEN promo_begin_date AND promo_end_date;

INSERT INTO sales (prod_id, cust_id, time_id, channel_id, promo_id, quantity_sold, amount_sold) VALUES (117, 100247, '2023-11-15', 3, NULL, 1, (SELECT prod_list_price FROM products WHERE prod_id = 117));

error_info: Error: NOT NULL constraint failed: sales.promo_id

instruction: I'm Dakota Campbell (cust_id 100484) looking to purchase a new golf bag. I want to see all available golf bags priced between $100-$300, then purchase the 'Pro Series Golf Bag' (prod_id 117) in blue color for $249.99. After purchase, confirm the sale was recorded with the correct amount and product details.

actions.sql: SELECT prod_id, prod_name, prod_desc, prod_list_price FROM products WHERE prod_category = 'Golf' AND prod_list_price BETWEEN 100 AND 300 AND prod_status = 'Available'
INSERT INTO sales (prod_id, cust_id, time_id, channel_id, promo_id, quantity_sold, amount_sold) VALUES (117, 100484, CURRENT_DATE, 1, NULL, 1, 249.99)
SELECT s.prod_id, p.prod_name, s.amount_sold, s.time_id FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.prod_id = p.prod_id WHERE s.cust_id = 100484 AND s.prod_id = 117 ORDER BY s.time_id DESC LIMIT 1

error_info: Error: NOT NULL constraint failed: sales.promo_id

instruction: Your name is Trent Roman and your customer ID is 1329. You want to update your email address to 'trent.roman@newmail.com' and check if your total purchases exceed $500 in the last year to qualify for a loyalty discount. You're in a hurry and want this done quickly.

actions.sql: UPDATE customers SET cust_email = 'trent.roman@newmail.com' WHERE cust_id = 1329;
SELECT SUM(amount_sold) AS total_spent FROM sales WHERE cust_id = 1329 AND time_id >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR);
